name: The Tale of Hitra
description:
Join 19 years old Prinveli and his magical fox-guardian Azeri on their mission to rescue Prinveli's missing best friend.

"The Tale of Hitra" is a story based puzzle game that takes place in a fantasy world.

The game has:

- Interactive maps

- Rewarding exploration

- A mystery to solve

Note that this is still just a demo so both the game and the story are not yet finished.
